name: Future Finance
desc: Predicts Google's stock price from historical data, and showcases deep learning(LSTM-based RNN) in financial forecasting

name: Banking Insights
desc: Developed an artificial neural network (ANN) to predict bank customer churn using historical profile and banking activity data.

name: Pac-Man Master
desc: Trained an agent on visual inputs to master Pac-Man, strategizing based on pixel data representations.

name: Autopilot
desc: Trained an autonomous car to navigate complex traffic scenarios in a simulation without human intervention.

name: Movie Magic
desc: Built a movie recommendation system using collaborative filtering in PyTorch to predict user preferences from past interactions.

name: Fraud Detector
desc: Trained an autoencoder on normal credit card transactions to detect fraud by flagging transactions with high reconstruction errors as potentially fraudulent.

name: LSTM Chatbot
desc: A chatbot that uses LSTM neural networks trained on preprocessed conversation data to dynamically respond to user inputs

name: WellDesk
desc: A Chrome extension to enhance productivity and well-being for desk workers by using AI to generate personalized reminders for posture, breaks, and productivity tips.

name: Nearby
desc: A mobile application that helps users see the history and facts of any place they're in.

name: BeatLabs
desc: A web application that helps musicians convert vocal hums to musical instrumentals or beats.

name: MusicFusion
desc: Full-Stack music platform allowing accesss to SoundCloud and Spotify. Made using React.js, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB

name: Food Delivery Application
desc: A food delivery app that helps drivers and customers using Java, Dart, Python, and MySQL. Employed Agile methodologies using Jira.

name: City Tracing
desc: Utilized WebGL and JavaScript to make a project that ray traces a scene of a city using a JSON file.

name: MoviePitch
desc: An AI-driven movie pitch generator web application that crafts character-driven narratives and recommends apt actors, all wrapped up with a catchy title.

name: Lyrics Search App
desc: A dynamic Lyrics Search App using ReactJS and Bootstrap, fetching real-time data from the Musicxmatch API.

name: Soccer Filtering System
desc: A webapp that enable users to filter soccer matches by teams, players and leagues using APIs and scraping the internet

name: KnowItAll ChatBot
desc: An interactive chatbot application powered by the advanced AI capabilities of ChatGPT-4.

name: Animation Nation
desc: A mobile application that gives the user a list of animations to choose from. Each item chosen will use a unique screen transition animation to a second screen that simulates Android Fragments

name: Around The World
desc: An Augmented Reality souvenir: a virtual knickknack that morphs to represent various travel destinations, while smartly displaying real-time weather and time of the location.

name: Animated Stat Charts
desc: Creates animated statistics bar charts in C++ by reading from text files.

name: OpenStreet Map
desc: A console-based C++ program that utilizes a custom-built graph class and Dijkstras algorithm to navigate between buildings via footways

name: Baccarat Game
desc: A full stack Baccarat game that uses Java sockets, showcases expertise in frontend and backend development.

name: Amazon Clone
desc: Static front-end clone of Amazon built with React and firebase. Lets users sign in and browse products.

name: Disney+ Clone
desc: A front-end clone of Disney+ using React and Firebase. Lets users sign in and browse popular, new and recommended movies/shows.

name: Spotify Clone
desc: Static front-end clone of Spotify built with React and Firebase. Lets users sign in and browse various playlists and songs.

name: Youtube Audio Downloader
desc: A simple tool to download mp4 youtube videos and convert to audio mp3 files using Python.

name: Grocery List App
desc: A mobile application that allows users to add and delete to a grocery list. Utilized Firebase database and has dark/light modes.
